title: Ghân-Buri-Ghân and locations with the "Immune to player card effects" text

comments.content: Can Ghân-Buri-Ghân [http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Details/Ghan-buri-Ghan-TFotW]'s discard ability (his travel action) ignore the travel effects on locations with the "immune to player effects" text?

No, immunity protects it from Ghan-buri-Ghan's effect.  

 

It would break a number of scenarios if you were able to do this.
